title.value: Responsibilities of a School Hub Manager

ul.li: Set a semester club goal and set a plan to achieve the goal.
Email your parent hub the School Hub Information Form.
Attend the parent hub meetings or meet with the parent hub manager at least twice per semester.
Make sure club members record their service hours using the Doopoint System.

value.strong: 3. By the end of the second semester

ul.li: Find new officer candidates to act as the school hub managers for the next school year.
Introduce the new officers to the parent hub before school ends.

Since Labdoo does not operate with money, students are not expected to do fund raising at school. However, some schools require school clubs to participate in school fund raising events. If that's the case, the school hub has the right to decide how to best apply the club funds toward club activities.
